displayName.english: Open the game for the first time

description.english: Open the game for the first time
Congratulations! You found the most radical way to unlock an achievement: closing the game.
You took your first leap! Keep jumping
Double digits! You're getting the hang of this.
Thirty hops and counting. You're on a roll!
Your first death. Don’t worry, it happens to the best of us
You died again… maybe practice makes perfect?
Three deaths! Are you getting used to this?
Four deaths. Maybe rethink your strategy.
Ten deaths! You’ve truly embraced the danger.
You made it through the first minute. The clock is just getting started
Two minutes down! Things are heating up
Three minutes in… you can almost smell the end
Four minutes survived! Just one more to prove your worth
The clock hit zero. Whether you won or lost, you faced the end
Five deaths! At least you’re consistent.
Forty jumps! Your legs must be feeling it
Halfway to a hundred! Keep bouncing
ixty jumps! You’re really jumping into it
Seventy hops! Almost at the century mark
Eighty jumps! You’re a true jumper now
Ninety jumps! One more leap to the big milestone
One hundred jumps! You’ve mastered the art of jumping
Some say those who jump far enough touch the clouds… Have you reached the limit?
Six deaths… you’re starting to collect them.
Seven deaths. Are you trying to set a record?
Eight deaths. Your corpse parade continues
Nine deaths! Almost like a cat… almost
Twenty deaths! You’re starting to build quite the résumé.
Forty deaths! You’re becoming a true master of failure
Eighty deaths! Your shadow seems to follow you everywhere
A century of deaths! You’re practically a legend… of dying.
Two hundred deaths! Some call it skill, others call it insanity
Three hundred deaths… yet here you are, still trying. Are you even human?
Every story starts somewhere. Welcome to Level 1
Level 2 — keep moving forward.
Level 3! You're learning fast
Level 4 cleared. Confidence rising.
Five levels done! You’re going strong
Level 6! Nothing can stop you now
Seven already? Maybe luck’s on your side
Level 8 complete. You’re in the zone
Level 9 cleared. The road only gets harder from here.
Ten levels down! You’ve proven your worth
Level 11 reached. You’re past the basics
Twelve levels, twelve victories
Level 13 done. But not for you
Fourteen levels and counting
Level 15 cleared! You’re in deep now
Level 16 — smooth as ever
Level 17 complete. Fast learner!
Level 18 conquered. Things are getting serious
Nineteen levels down. Keep the fire alive
Twenty levels! That’s real dedication
Level 21 — no sign of slowing down
Level 22 reached. You’ve got endurance
Level 23 — the end is getting closer
Twenty-four stages of survival
Level 25! You’ve gone the distance
Level 26 cleared. Things are heating up
Level 27 done. You’ve got nerves of steel
Twenty-eight levels conquered
Level 29. One step away from thirty
Thirty levels! You’re a true survivor
Level 31 reached. You can feel the finish line.
Level 32 cleared — just a few more to go
Level 33. Don’t lose focus now
Level 34 done. Just one more step...
You reached Level 35 — the ultimate achievement!
You reached the final screen. Few make it this far — but your story might not be over yet.
You found something truly special… but what does it mean?
You found something truly special… but what does it mean?
